SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW_SEQ , COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_RECORD_COUNT , pt0.* FROM (
SELECT /* com.at.apcss.fm.popup.mapper.GpcSelectPopupMapper.selectGpcList */ ITEM_NM ,(SELECT MIN(ITEM_CD) FROM TB_ITEM_CRTR WHERE ITEM_NM = IC.ITEM_NM ) AS ITEM_CD , CTGRY_CD FROM (SELECT ITEM_NM , CTGRY_CD FROM TB_ITEM_CRTR WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND ITEM_NM != '기타' GROUP BY ITEM_NM , CTGRY_CD) IC WHERE 1=1
AND IC.ITEM_NM LIKE '%'||#{ctgryNm}||'%'
AND IC.ITEM_NM LIKE '%'||#{itemNm}||'%'
ORDER BY IC.ITEM_NM ASC
) pt0 OFFSET (#{currentPageNo} - 1) * #{recordCountPerPage} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{recordCountPerPage} ROWS ONLY
